mapper.sql: f.no , f.origin_name , f.save_name , f.save_path , f.extension , f.size , f.parent_no , f.parent_type , f.author_no , f.status
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM file_info f LEFT OUTER JOIN post p ON f.parent_no = p.no WHERE f.no = #{fileInfoNo} AND ( (f.parent_type = 'POST' AND p.status != 'DELETED') OR f.parent_type IS NULL )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM file_info f WHERE f.no = #{fileInfoNo}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM post p INNER JOIN file_info f ON p.no = f.parent_no WHERE f.no = #{fileInfoNo} AND p.status = 'DELETED'
